mapper.select: SELECT c.chatroom_id, CASE WHEN c.sender_id = #{memberId} THEN u2.name ELSE u1.name END AS opponent_name, m.content AS last_message, m.sent_at AS last_time, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chatmessage WHERE chatroom_id = c.chatroom_id AND is_read = 0 AND sender_id != #{memberId} ) AS unread_count FROM chatroom c JOIN dv_users u1 ON c.sender_id = u1.member_id JOIN dv_users u2 ON c.receiver_id = u2.member_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM chatmessage WHERE (chatroom_id, sent_at) IN ( SELECT chatroom_id, MAX(sent_at) FROM chatmessage GROUP BY chatroom_id ) ) m ON c.chatroom_id = m.chatroom_id WHERE c.sender_id = #{memberId} OR c.receiver_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY m.sent_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatroom (chatroom_id, sender_id, receiver_id) VALUES (#{chatroomId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId})
mapper.select: SELECT chatroom_id AS chatroomId, sender_id AS memberId, facility_id AS facilityId, created_at AS createdAt FROM chatroom WHERE sender_id = #{memberId}
